content:
{"name": "Met Council - Hebrew Education Society", "alternate_name": "", "description": "How to Register (New Registrants):
1) Visit ( market.metcouncil.org ) to begin. Click “Order Food” and choose “Sign Up”
2) Register yourself and your household members and wait to hear from your Pantry Manager
3) Once you hear from your Pantry Manager, log in at market.metcouncil.org and start ordering
4) Choose a pick-up time during Pantry hours
5) Check email for confirmation and your receipt
How to Place Your Order Using Market:
1) Visit market.metcouncil.org to begin. Log in with your email address or phone number. Use PASSWORD Market@9502
2) Start shopping for items
3) When ready to place an order, click the shopping cart icon
4) Choose a pick-up time during Pantry hours
5) Check email for confirmation and receipt
H.E.S. Pantry Guidelines: You can utilize our Food Pantry once a month. You must come at your scheduled appointment date and time.  Please understand that no boxes will be held past your appointment date.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.thehes.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9502 Seaview Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Canarsie", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11236", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.632485, "longitude": -73.8906954}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 241-3000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "May be closed during Jewish holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Kosher food available"}]}
